p: Interesterified oils (IO) and a physical blend (PHY) were prepared with SBO and PGO. IO and PHY contained similar total fatty acid compositions but different TAG species profiles. To prepare IO, SBO and PGO (1:1 molar ratio, w/ w) were mixed with Lipozyme ® RMIM (20% by total weight of substrates). Interesterification was carried out for 6 h at 50 °C in a water bath shaker at 200 rpm. PHY was prepared by simple blending with SBO and PGO at molar ratio of 1:1 ( w/ w).
